overview: Is there love after death? The small rural community of Port Oram can answer that. When deranged young Dolores Finley (ZoÃ« Daelman Chlanda) appears out of nowhere to begin work at the Beech's Funeral Home, the local mortuary soon becomes more than just a quiet place of rest. Dolores' passion for cadavers gives new meaning to the phrase "disturbing the peace".
title: I'll Bury You Tomorrow
